<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Hathor (Mistress of Jubilation)](/Deities.aspx?ID=52)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Give wealth to new families, aid traders and miners, support musicians, protect and encourage lovers

**Anathema** Discriminate or slight someone based on appearance, intentionally disfigure a creature, refuse food to the starving

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **2nd**
[Tree Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=342)

- **8th**
[Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347)

</column>
name: Hathor (Mistress of Jubilation)
